name: Equaland
storyline: In the world where everything was unevenly distributed, you arrive and find a way to make things equal.
summary:
EQUALAND is a mobile puzzle game with numbered hexagonal tiles of various colors. Players' goal is to match every tile to have the same number. Sounds simple, but not really. Seemingly straightforward rules are elaborately united to guarantee fun AND challenging gameplay. 
 
Game Features: 
- 7 different color tiles 
- 3 Special tiles/elements 
- 70+ puzzles, from easy ones to the most challenging 
- A bonus puzzle for hardcore puzzle lovers
